BRES.QA.summary: Barwa Real Estate Company is a real estate investment firm specializing in real estate projects which include residential facilities, a motor city, warehouses, and complementary commercial and retail spaces. The firm engages in investment, development, and management of properties with a focus on Qatar and Saudi Arabia. It also invests in stocks of real estate firms. The firm invests in the real estate markets across the globe. Its portfolio includes residential and commercial property and hotels. Barwa Real Estate Company was founded on January 19, 2006 and is based in Doha, Qatar.
